form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION FOR IMMIGRANT VISA AND ALIEN REGISTRATION, 0534496

full_text: 1 Form FS-256a FOREIGN SERVICE OF THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA (Revised 12-1-56) m approved. get Bureau No. 47-R108.5. APPLICATION FOR IMMIGRANT VISA I- 053496 AND ALIEN REGISTRATION I, the undersigned, being duly sworn, state the following facts regarding myself and hereby make application for an IMMIGRANT VISA and ALIEN REGISTRATION under the Immigration and Nationality Act to the American Consulate Consul at Sydney, Australia : 1. Family name Given name Initial 2. Date and place of birth Age Bratislava, Czechoslovakia SANITRIK Lewis June 3,1904 62 3. Other names used or by which known 4. Present address Government House, Sydney, Australia 5. If going to relative, friend or organization, state name and address in 6. Address of final destination in United States, if any, unless stated in Item 5 United States Mrs. Anderson, 1546 Clinton Avenue, Trenton, New Jersey 7. Name and address of father 8. Name and address of mother 9. If neither parent living, name and address of next of kin in home country Maria Sanitrik Mr. Charles Sanitrik, 209 Young Street, deceased North Unley, Adelaide, South Australia Australia 10. Color of 1 11. Height 12. Weight 13. Complexion 14. Marks of identification 15. Sex 16. Marital Status Hair Eyes Male Married Single grey brown ft. g in. 182...lbs. none Female Widowed Divorced medium 17. Calling or occupation 18. Nationality Australian 21. Languages Spoken Read Written 19. Race white English butler 20. Ethnic classification Hungarian X X X Czech German Russian X X X 22. Intended port of entry into United States 23. I (do) (do not) have a ticket to final 24. Purpose of going to United States destination. New York Permanent residence 25. Places of principal residence after sixteenth birthday City or Town Province Country From-To Occupation Kosice Czechoslovakia 1920-1939 student,businessman Budapest Hungary 1939-1947 businessman Han over Germany 1947-1949 Melbourne Victoria Australia 1949-1953 factory worker Alice Springs Australia 1954-1954 cook Sydney Australia 1954-1958 butler 26. Names and places of residence of spouse and children 27. I claim to be a nonquotar } immigrant for the following reasons: preference quota non Katrina Sanitrik, deceased Mr. Charles Sanitrik, 209 Young Street, NorthUnley, Adelaide, South Australia 28. Documents submitted in support of this application and made a part hereof, are as follows: Birth certificate & translation Bank statement Death statement Medical certificate Police certificate 29. I have never been arrested, convicted, in prison, in an almshouse, treated in an institution or hospital or other place for insanity or other mental disease, or the beneficiary of a pardon or an amnesty, except as stated below: 30. I have never applied to any American consular officer, either formally or informally, for a visa or other documentation as an immigrant or nonimmigrant, except as stated below: 31. (a) I have never been excluded nor deported from the United States, except as stated below: (b) I have never been removed from the United States at Government expense, except as stated below: (Application continued on reverse side) 6-73220-1
